label: uncl6245
comment: Code qualifying the type of a temperature.

values.label: Storage temperature
values.comment: [6240] The temperature at which the cargo is to be kept while it is in storage.

values.label: Transport temperature
values.comment: [6242] The temperature at which cargo is to be kept while it is under transport.

values.label: Cargo operating temperature
values.comment: The temperature at which cargo is to be kept during cargo handling.

values.label: Transport emergency temperature
values.comment: The temperature at which emergency procedures apply for the disposal of temperature-controlled goods.

values.label: Transport control temperature
values.comment: The maximum temperature at which certain products can be safely transported.

values.label: Boiling point
values.comment: The  temperature at which a liquid begins to boil.

values.label: Self-accelerating decomposition temperature (SADT)
values.comment: The lowest temperature at which self-accelerating decomposition may occur for a substance in the packaging as used in transport.

values.label: Self-accelerating polymerization temperature (SAPT)
values.comment: The lowest temperature at which polymerization may occur for a substance.
